org.apache.ignite.springdata.repository

Interface IgniteRepository<T,ID extends Serializable>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<T,ID>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<T,ID>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IgniteRepositoryImpl

    public interface IgniteRepository<T,ID extends Serializable>
extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<T,ID>
    Apache Ignite repository that extends basic capabilities of CrudRepository.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteAll(Iterable<ID> ids)
      Deletes all the entities for the provided ids.
      <S extends T>
      S      		 save(ID key, S entity)
      Saves a given entity using provided key.
      <S extends T>
      Iterable<S>      		 save(Map<ID,S> entities)
      Saves all given keys and entities combinations.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository

        count, delete, deleteAll, deleteAll, deleteById, existsById, findAll, findAllById, findById, save, saveAll

    • Method Detail

      • save

        <S extends T> S save(ID key,
                     S entity)
        Saves a given entity using provided key.

        It's suggested to use this method instead of default CrudRepository.save(Object) that generates IDs (keys) that are not unique cluster wide.
        Type Parameters:
        S - Entity type.
        Parameters:
        key - Entity's key.
        entity - Entity to save.
        Returns:
        Saved entity.

      • save

        <S extends T> Iterable<S> save(Map<ID,S> entities)
        Saves all given keys and entities combinations.

        It's suggested to use this method instead of default CrudRepository#save(Iterable) that generates IDs (keys) that are not unique cluster wide.
        Type Parameters:
        S - type of entities.
        Parameters:
        entities - Map of key-entities pairs to save.
        Returns:
        Saved entities.

      • deleteAll

        void deleteAll(Iterable<ID> ids)
        Deletes all the entities for the provided ids.
        Parameters:
        ids - List of ids to delete.
